alert.note: Alert for Bath; Bedford; City of Covington; Craig (Virginia) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Weather Statement issued June 17 at 12:34AM EDT until June 17 at 1:30AM EDT by NWS Blacksburg
info.description: ...THE SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING FOR ALLEGHANY COUNTY IN WEST CENTRAL VIRGINIA...NORTHEASTERN CRAIG COUNTY IN SOUTHWESTERN VIRGINIA...SOUTHWESTERN ROCKBRIDGE AND SOUTHWESTERN BATH COUNTIES IN WEST CENTRAL VIRGINIA...NORTHWESTERN BEDFORD COUNTY IN SOUTH CENTRAL VIRGINIA...BOTETOURT COUNTY IN WEST CENTRAL VIRGINIA...SOUTHEASTERN GREENBRIER AND NORTHEASTERN MONROE COUNTIES IN SOUTHEASTERN WEST VIRGINIA AND THE CITY OF COVINGTON HAS EXPIRED... The severe thunderstorm which prompted the warning has moved south. Remember, a Severe Thunderstorm Warning still remains in effect for The City of Covington, Southern Alleghany County, Northeastern Craig County, Southwestern Rockbridge County, Northeastern Bedford County, Botetourt County, West central Amherst County in central Virginia, Southwestern Greenbrier County, Northeastern Summers County, and Monroe County until 130 AM.

area.areaDesc: Bath; Bedford; City of Covington; Craig
